Class CollectionDAO

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, org.quartz.Job

    @WebServlet(value="/admin/buildCollectionIndex")
public class CollectionDAO
extends FachRefServlet
implements org.quartz.Job
    Methods to access the index of collections to allow retrieval of regions by JPA queries.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg
